descriptionHtml:
This  is a familiar faces follower &  character add on
this is my first upload hope everything works right you will need 
to get the same as they have been saved as 

Ragnarok V1_1,Ragnarok V1_5,
JC containers, Familiar Faces, skse_1_07_01,
Immersive Armors, Masters of Death - Sicarius Armor Standalone
,HGO_cbbe-,Hunting Grounds Weapon Pack v2.5a,
the tool of the gray fox quest
Better Females by Bella Version,
black mage armor,
Lustriannas Daedric Armor - CBBE Blessed,
Lustrianna_Compatibility_Patches
 they have been saved as level 18 to 90 

I am adding some saved games for backup reasons
Or if you want too play as one of them
hope you enjoy
P.S
I have no idea how to do screen shoots  so please feel to add some
author: robinhoodlm
